Case# SWAttributionView.HorizontalAlignment.default

Allows the system to choose the horizontal alignment.iOS 16.0+iPadOS 16.0+Mac Catalyst 16.0+macOS 13.0+tvOS 16.0+visionOS 1.0+

```
case `default`
```

## [See Also](/documentation/SharedWithYou/SWAttributionView/HorizontalAlignment-swift.enum/default#see-also)

### [Horizontal alignments](/documentation/SharedWithYou/SWAttributionView/HorizontalAlignment-swift.enum/default#Horizontal-alignments)

[`case leading`](/documentation/sharedwithyou/swattributionview/horizontalalignment-swift.enum/leading)Aligns horizontally with the leading edge of the view.[`case center`](/documentation/sharedwithyou/swattributionview/horizontalalignment-swift.enum/center)Aligns horizontally with the center of the view.[`case trailing`](/documentation/sharedwithyou/swattributionview/horizontalalignment-swift.enum/trailing)Aligns horizontally with the trailing edge of the view.
